sect2.title: Dépendances d'installation de Modutils
sect2.para: (Dernière vérification effectuée auprès de la version &modutils-depversion;.)
sect2.literallayout: Bash: sh Binutils: ar, as, ld, ranlib, strip Bison: bison Diffutils: cmp Fileutils: chmod, install, ln, mkdir, mv, rm Flex: flex Gcc: cc, cc1, collect2, cpp0, gcc Grep: egrep, grep Make: make Sed: sed Sh-utils: basename, expr, hostname, uname Textutils: cat, tr
